content: slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 36fpdc 36bpdc round 31 red join around the post of any fpdc with a standing fpdc 1bpdc around the next st 1fpdc around the next st 1bpdc around the next st repeat 34 more times join to the top of the beginning fpdc wi th a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 36fpdc 36bpdc round 32 green join around the post of any fpdc with a standing fpdc 1bpdc around the next st 1fpdc around the next st 1bpdc around the next st repeat 34 more times join to the top of the beginning fpdc with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch c ount 36fpdc 36bpdc make a pompom using all three colours and attach it to the top of the beanie your christmas beanie is now complete 13 thank you for your support for more visit us on ravelry com/designers/hooked-on-sunshine etsy com/shop/hookedonsunshineza hookedonsunshine co/youtube com instagram com/hooked_on_sunshine/ facebook com/groups/1370975902929963 hookedonsunshine co you can get assistance in our facebook group with pattern questions for billing or other issues you can email queries to hosteam@hookedonsunshine co as always a special thank you to our test team keeping you hooked until next time 14
